summary: Completed comprehensive backend testing of LogicCanvas workflow validation endpoint. All core functionality and edge cases working correctly.
passed_tests: Health endpoint returns 200 with status and database fields
Validation endpoint returns 404 for unknown workflow ID
Valid workflow validation returns correct JSON structure (workflow_id, issues array, issue_count)
Validation catches structural issues (missing start node)
Validation catches missing form references with correct nodeId
Validation passes for workflows with valid form references
Validation catches decision node branch issues
Empty workflow validation catches no nodes error
Complex workflow validation identifies multiple issues correctly
All CRUD operations for workflows and forms working
